name: Interstellar Train
description:
This is a game for CiGA Game Jam made within 48 hours.  

CiGA Game Jam link

You are a minister of interstellar transportation company. You manage a team of robots to transport materials for the company. 

This road is full of danger, and you have been targeted by a group of interstellar pirates. They will interfere with your robot by radio waves, and let it hit obstacles and destroy it. And you need monitor these iron guys to prevent them from making mistakes, otherwise the boss will not forgive you!

Enjoy the ride! Thanks for playing! Present you by Electric Sheep Team

Designer: Tilapia Programmer:  Alivecat Artist: Jude , Oustar , Joe  Audio Designer: Waizer

Thanks to those nice itch.io creater who have provided us free assets!
